name: Stick Guys Run
description:
Remember: you should save your Stick Guyes AS LONG AS YOU CAN! They will get stuck and die in traps. If you lose one don't be upset you will have a chance to pick up another.

How to control:

Drag and drop lil Stick Guys to replace them, hold on empty area to summon the big one (he will follow your finger)!

Made by command Bosss of this JAM:

Fedoseev Olef Evgenevich - programmer

Smagin Nikita Alekseevich - programmer

Nasonkin Andrew Alekseevich - game designer

Karaseva Ekaterina Igorevna - artist
